Description: Connect to any form with our Webhook connector
Name: Generic Webhook

Methods.Name: DELETE
Methods.Description: Send a DELETE request to another endpoint.

Methods.Name: POST
Methods.Description: POST JSON to another endpoint. Add custom fields to this method as request body data.

Methods.Name: GET
Methods.Description: GET JSON from another endpoint. Add custom fields to this method as request body data.

Methods.Name: PUT
Methods.Description: PUT JSON on another endpoint. Add custom fields to this method as request body data.

Methods.Name: PATCH
Methods.Description: PATCH JSON on another endpoint. Add custom fields to this method as request body data.

Methods.Name: Webhook
Methods.Description: Add fields to this connector to interact with a Webhook. Accepts JSON, XML, or form encoded data.  Specify which in the "Content-Type" HTTP Header of a Request.

Methods.Name: Synchronous Response
Methods.Description: Add fields to this connector to respond to a Webhook. Returns JSON, XML, or form encoded data. Specify which using the "Accept"  HTTP Header of a Request.

MetaTile: Generic Webhook Integration - Automatically Sync Website Data - Cyclr
MetaDescription: Connect your website or application to your business systems through Cyclr's Webhook integration, passing your data to where you need it.
